summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting a proffer interview conducted at the Southern District of New York. The interview was attended by federal prosecutors and law enforcement agents, and the subject provided information relating to an investigation. The document references attached notes from a prior date.

keyFacts: A proffer interview was conducted with an individual named Perez on December 20, 2019, at the SDNY.
The interview was attended by Assistant United States Attorneys, an FBI Special Agent, and an FBI Task Force Officer Detective.
The document references attached investigative notes from August 21, 2019.
The document is an FBI 302 form, which is a record of an interview, and contains neither recommendations nor conclusions of the FBI.
The case file number referenced is 90A-NY-3151227.
